verilog.linting.linter.description: Select the verilog linter. Possible values are 'iverilog', 'verilator', xvlog' or 'none'.

verilog.linting.xvlog.arguments.description: Add xvlog arguments here. They will be added to xvlog while linting.

verilog.linting.iverilog.arguments.description: Add Icarus Verilog arguments here (like macros). They will be added to Icarus Verilog while linting (The command "-t null" will be added by the linter by default).

verilog.linting.iverilog.runAtFileLocati.description: If enabled, Icarus Verilog will be run at the file location for linting. Else it will be run at workspace folder. Disabled by default.

verilog.linting.modelsim.runAtFileLocati.description: If enabled, Modelsim will be run at the file location for linting. Else it will be run at workspace folder. Disabled by default.

verilog.linting.modelsim.arguments.description: Add Modelsim arguments here. They will be added to Modelsim while linting.

verilog.linting.verilator.arguments.description: Add Verilator arguments here (like macros). They will be added to Verilator while linting (The command "--lint-only -I<document folder>" will be added by the linter by default).

verilog.linting.verilator.runAtFileLocat.description: If enabled, Verilator will be run at the file location for linting. Else it will be run at workspace folder. Disabled by default.

verilog.linting.verilator.useWSL.description: If enabled, run verilator in WSL.

verilog.ctags.path.description: A path to the installation of Universal Ctags.

verilog.languageServer.description: Select the Language Server. Currently supports `svls`.
